description: The file 'observer.md' is a Markdown document that provides a description, example code, and usage instructions for a file/directory observer component designed to monitor filesystem changes, particularly using inotify on Linux systems. It includes C++ code snippets demonstrating how to implement a file or directory monitor by inheriting from an interface and registering with a singleton monitor instance.

classes.name: FileChangeMonitor
classes.description: A class that implements the ICallback interface to monitor filesystem files or directories and invoke a callback when changes are detected.

methods.name: Updated
methods.description: Callback method invoked when the monitored file or directory has changed.
